snippet: Friday marks the 70th anniversary of the Allied invasion of Normandy — June 6, 1944. Three residents of the Long Island State Veterans Home recall what it was like on the ground.
abstract: Julian Oleaga, Ben Gebbia and Michael Settanni, New Yorkers who are all veterans of World War II and live in Long Island State Veterans Home at the State University of New York at Stony Brook, reflect on participating in the Allied invasion of Normandy on its 70th anniversary.
lead_paragraph: Friday marks the 70th anniversary of the Allied invasion of Normandy — June 6, 1944. Three residents of the Long Island State Veterans Home recall what it was like on the ground.
